page.title: 17A Catholic girl, Cotteridge
page.content: I am a{Catholic}and belong to SS Joseph and Helen's Parish. Our church is in Station Road and Father Bouchier is our {Parish Priest.} On the 29th April 1985 I received the{Gift of the Holy Spirit} through the{Sacrament of Confirmation.} I was Confirmed by {Bishop Cleary} and chose the name St Jane as a sign of becoming a {full member} of the Church. Before we were confirmed, the bishop blessed us. My {sponsor} and I went to the {altar,} the bishop put her hand on my right shoulder, I said my {Confirmation Name,} then the bishop said, "Jane be sealed with the gift of the Holy Spirit". I said, "Amen" and the bishop {anointed my forehead} with the {Oil of Christ.} It was a very special occasion for me, my family, my school and for my parish.
